meanings.definition: A timid, weak, or unassertive person.
meanings.sent1: The classroom was full of milquetoasts who never spoke up.
meanings.sent2: She always felt like a milquetoast in social situations.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends jokingly called themselves the Milquetoast Club.
meanings.sent4: His boss described him as a milquetoast, always avoiding confrontation.
meanings.sent5: The character in the story was portrayed as a milquetoast, easily pushed around by others.

meanings.definition: To act in a timid, weak, or unassertive manner.
meanings.sent1: He tends to milquetoast around difficult decisions, never taking a stand.
meanings.sent2: Don't milquetoast when it comes to standing up for what you believe in.
meanings.sent3: She tried to milquetoast her way out of the argument, but her friend saw through it.
meanings.sent4: The politician was criticized for milquetoasting on important issues.
meanings.sent5: In order to succeed, you must not milquetoast in the face of challenges.
